revised_title: Exploring the Evolution of Reproductive Strategies and Trade-offs
tldr: This article discusses the evolution of reproductive strategies and the importance of trade-offs in shaping these strategies. It highlights the challenges in measuring genetic correlations and the potential for complementary approaches using genetic and physiological methods. The author also emphasizes the need for a better understanding of development rate and senescence, as well as the importance of the comparative method in testing evolutionary theories.
